                  {

                        $this->Database->unlock();

Definition at line 136 of file schedule.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Package = get_package( $Task->package_name , $Task->package_version , __FILE__ );
                        $NextIteration = intval( 
                              call_user_func( array( $Package , 'process_task' ) , $Task->parameters , $Task->next_iteration )
                        );
                        
                        $IntervalField = $NextIteration == 0 ? 'time_step' : 'iteration_step';
                        
                        $this->Database->update( 
                              'umx_schedule' , 
                              array( 
                                    'processing' , 'next_processing_time' , '`count`' , 'archived' , 'next_iteration' 
                              ) , 
                              array( 
                                    0 , "DATE_ADD( NOW() , INTERVAL $IntervalField SECOND )" , 
                                    'IF( `count` > 1 , `count` - 1 , 1 )' , 'IF( type = 1 AND `count` = 1 , 1 , 0 )' , 
                                    $NextIteration 
                              ) , 
                              'id = '.$Task->id
                        );

                        $this->Database->commit();
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->Database->lock( array( 'umx_schedule' ) , array( 'WRITE' ) );
                        
                        $this->Settings->load_file( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_schedule_settings' );
                        $Tasks = $this->ScheduleAlgorithms->get_tasks( 
                              $this->Settings->get_setting( 'processing_tasks_count' , 10 )
                        );
                        
                        if( isset( $Tasks[ 0 ] ) )
                        {
                              $this->process_all_tasks( $Tasks );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $this->Database->unlock();
                        }
                  }
